duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate visual and brand identity into board, card, and book designs
Create graphics for various mediums, including online and offline assets/print materials
Collaborate with multiple departments for project management and design coordination
Generate design templates for printed products and text/graphic layout for print assets
Maintain graphic consistency across all deliverables and platforms
Assist other design and project teams to create original visual media in a unified way

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design or related field
